sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import SideBar from "../components/sidebar"; import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; const AddVehicle = () =>{ const [vehicle, setVehicle] = useState({ vehicleName: '', vehicleType: '', brandModel: '', chasisNo: '', plateNo: '', category: '', noOfSeats: '', condition: '' }) const [response, setResponse] = useState([]) const values = (e) =>{ setVehicle({...vehicle, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } function addVehicle(e){ e.preventDefault() axios.post("/api/add-vehicle", vehicle).then(res =>{ setResponse(res.data) }) } return( <>

ADD VEHICLE

Vehicle Name:

Select Vehicle Type:

To:

{response.server_message}

) } export default AddVehicle;
